title: Straya GamingLF Coaches for OOL teams next year
body:
Hey,

Straya Gaming is looking for a few coaches to help some up and coming OOL into OCS teams that'll be playing next year. We'll be looking for a few things in a coach such as knowledge, experience in eSports, willing to learn with our Manager and etc.

IGN:
How long have you played league for?:
What experience do you have: 
What roles have you mained?:

Anything other questions will be asked by myself and our Manager.

From, 
Hopë
